word:
Orebro
     On our way to Christiania, we spent two days in Orebro, where there is a small company of Sabbath-keepers. 
200
This place is situated in the central part of Sweden, in the midst of a fruitful valley, beyond which, in the distant west, the blue mountains are visible. It has upwards of twelve thousand inhabitants, and is one of the oldest cities in Sweden, having probably been a city for a thousand years.
